A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, people not being able to let go of their own mind cannon. I loved the movie guess I'm not a true hardcore fan....I mean my years of collectibles\, my reading of books since the release of the Thrawn Trilogy to the Legacy Comics.
